name: Blanka
title: The Beast of the Amazon
subtitle: A wild warrior who harnesses electricity and bestial instincts
lore: Raised in the harsh environment of the Amazon rainforest, Blanka developed unique fighting abilities that combine savage strength with electrical attacks. His feral appearance belies a kind heart and fierce loyalty to those he considers friends.

passive.name: Electric Skin
passive.description: Blanka's abilities generate electrical charges (max 5). Each charge increases his attack speed by [5%] and movement speed by [3%].

Q.name: Electric Ball
Q.description: Blanka curls into a ball and rolls forward, dealing [75/145/215/285/355] damage and generating one electrical charge. The roll can be steered slightly.

W.name: Savage Leap
W.description: Blanka leaps to a target location, dealing [80/150/220/290/360] damage and slowing enemies by [30%] for [2s]. Generates one electrical charge on hit.

E.name: Electric Shock
E.description: Blanka releases an electrical discharge, dealing [90/160/230/300/370] damage to nearby enemies. Damage and area increase with each electrical charge consumed.

R.name: Primal Surge
R.description: Blanka enters a feral state for [6s], gaining maximum electrical charges and [40%] bonus movement speed. During this time, his abilities cost no mana and generate double charges.

1.name: Extended Stun
1.description: Blanka's 3rd basic attacks now stuns for an additional [0.3] second

1.name: Enhanced Reflection
1.description: Taunting Presence reflects [20%] of the damage he receives

1.name: Unstoppable Charge
1.description: Blanka can't be CC-d during Bestial Charge

5.name: CC Follow-up
5.description: Smash deals [25%] more damage to targets who were CC-d in the past [2] seconds by Blanka

5.name: Perfect Defense
5.description: Blanka takes no damage during Taunting Presence, however he won't reflect any [can't be chosen if LvL1 b]

5.name: Swift Movement
5.description: Item: Upon activation Blanka moves [12%] faster for [1.5s]

10.name: Aftershock
10.description: Earthquake also slows by [30%] for [1s] after the knock-up ends

10.name: Ability Focus
10.description: You lose your R ability, but your spell cooldowns are decreased by [3s]

15.name: Physical Resistance
15.description: Blanka gains [16%] physical damage reduction as passive

15.name: Magic Resistance
15.description: Blanka gains [35%] magic damage reduction as passive

20.name: CC Master
20.description: CC-ing an enemy grants infinitely stacking movement speed [1 CC = 1 MS]

20.name: Unbreakable Defense
20.description: While using "Taunting Presence," Blanka becomes immune to crowd control effects.

20.name: Second Life
20.description: Item: You can instantly revive (345s cooldown)

20.name: Shattering Impact
20.description: Earthquake breaks damage reduction for [1.2s] if it hits

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
